Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: A story of hope and friendship in a prison setting.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The saga of a crime family and their rise to power.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: A gritty tale of a vigilante fighting crime in Gotham City.

Description: A harrowing depiction of the Holocaust and a man's redemption.

Description: Interwoven stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.

Title: Forrest Gump

Title: The Matrix
